inert.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: not producing a chemical reaction when combined with other substances
inert.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: not moving, or not having the strength or power to move
inert.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He lay, inert, in his bed.
inert.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The government was inert and inefficient.
